name: Pulp Fantasy
description:
Made in 72 hours for Game Zanga 2017. Downloadable Windows build available below.

~

You wake up to find yourself on a strange island. Explore the island and interact with its denizens; will you help them in their needs? Will you ignore them and explore? Will you kill them?

For every action there will be consequences. Some will make your life easier, and some will make your life harder. And every choice can alter the ending.

Will you do as the ferryman asked you and kill a person? After all, he seems to be your only chance to get off the island.

~

Features:

1) Action-adventure platform gameplay.

2) Open world.

3) 4 different endings.

4) 4 variations on the final boss - based on each ending.

5) Low-fi pixel-art style.

~

Controls:

Arrows: Move

C: Jump

X: Attack (why would you)

Enter: Start/Progress

R: Resets the game.

~

Have fun! Would love to hear your comments :)
